definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: [move slowly] (NH Pi. [[דִּדָּה]] lead slowly, Hithp. [[הִדַּדָּה]]; Aram. [[דַּדִּי]], [[אִידַּדִּי]]; Ar. d0’d0’ is run quickly (of a camel): on form, cf. Kö:i. 587; SS der. fr. [[דאה]] cf. Sta:§ 112 a, 150 a. 129 b, 581 d)—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. sf. [[אֲדַדֵּם]] (so read for MT [[אֶדַּדֵּם]] Dy Bi & Che, cf. his crit. note) lead slowly (in procession) Ps 42:5.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. [[אֶדַּדֶּה]] Is 38:15; also sf. [[אֶדַּדֵּם]] Ps 42:5 MT but cf. supr.;—walk deliberately, at ease (De Che Di), or as in procession (Ew), Is 38:15 (cf. Che Di VB).
